title: Trading SGC 3 Fred Clarke HoF’er for Detroit Tigers
author: Wannabeoldschool

posts.post_title: Trading SGC 3 Fred Clarke HoF’er for Detroit Tigers
posts.post_content:
Members,

I still have this, so let’s actively try to move it.

I’m wanting to trade this Sweet Caporal Fred Clarke for any Detroit Tiger/s of similar value in the the PSA/SGC 3-5 range. I can add $$ if needed. I only have 46 of 329 (14%) of the Tigers master set, so chances are you have something I need. 

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2oMXXtZ][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53028701563_09a3f6e8b8_z.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/2oMXXtZ]Untitled[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/157544384@N07/]michael scott[/url], on Flickr

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2oMXsxQ][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53028604230_778ca50809_z.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/2oMXsxQ]Untitled[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/157544384@N07/]michael scott[/url], on Flickr

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2oMWmAW][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53028389114_8fd04a2c78_z.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/2oMWmAW]Untitled[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/157544384@N07/]michael scott[/url], on Flickr

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2oMSte6][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53027630947_264369b486_z.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/2oMSte6]Untitled[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/157544384@N07/]michael scott[/url], on Flickr
Almost one year bump! I’ll add a coin photo if needed.
